availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ebenezer Wilson Sisk (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of Ebenezer B. Sisk and Mary Sisk. Married to Christina Williams Sisk in Hopkins County on August 31, 1856. Father of Jeff D. Sisk. Farmer and student in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 97A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 790.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Precinct 1, p. 2B.
